name: MichiganPublicNewscast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skills allows users in Michigan or with connections to Michigan to stay connected to the news impacting you locally as aired on Michigan Public, the state's most-listened to NPR station. This skill will provide access to our hourly newscast from the Alexa device of your choice. Simply ask Alexa to "play my flash briefing."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
